TopicTitle: The Scone One cruise missile (now with video)

Articles.Content:
Named after the fastest type of cake, I give you *The Scone One*...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P6pCyEYGWJo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![DAYFz3f.png](http://i.imgur.com/DAYFz3f.png)

![jPNjRVN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jPNjRVN.jpg)

![6JoeYaE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6JoeYaE.jpg)

It's capable of stupid-miles-per-hour just above sea level (1385m/s@240m). What's not to like?

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/fo47vcbhw5hfjpa/Mini%20fast%2019.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fo47vcbhw5hfjpa/Mini%20fast%2019.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T20:47:17Z" title="07/24/2015 08:47  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by Foxster**

lol.. I hope you don't mind if I get inspired by that name by stealing it for some of my SSTOS.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yeah.... that's way too fast for your own good. please see a doctor.

Does the fairing do anything aerodynamically?

> 
> lol.. I hope you don't mind if I get inspired by that name by stealing it for some of my SSTOS.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sure. Knock yourself out ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

> 
> Does the fairing do anything aerodynamically?

Well, in terms of reducing drag, yes, it does loads. It also has the highest temp rating of the parts, so is a good thing to stick out front. And it protects a bunch of parts from heating up in the airflow. Basically the craft is unflyable at high speed without it.

> 
> What the payload?

17 crew and 120t to orbit...Or maybe a bit less. 

Seriously though, I think I'll see if I can squeeze a Kerbal on board somewhere - along with a change of underwear.

> 
> 17 crew and 120t to orbit...Or maybe a bit less. 
> Seriously though, I think I'll see if I can squeeze a Kerbal on board somewhere - along with a change of underwear.

**JEB: "Bill? Get me my brown trousers..."** 

Seriously - that is freaking awesome. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
